column4: Help!!!!! my ubuntu on my laptop has screwed up it says :Mount of file system failed. A maintence shell will now be started. CONTROL-D will terminate this shell and re-try.
Help!!!!! my ubuntu on my laptop has screwed up it says :Mount of file system failed. A maintence shell will now be started. CONTROL-D will terminate this shell and re-try.
wait for a while, your system is checking itself.
